org.assertj.swing.exception

Class ActionFailedException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable

        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • org.assertj.swing.exception.ActionFailedException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ActionFailedException
extends java.lang.RuntimeException
    Error that occurred when simulation of user input failed.
    Author:
    Yvonne Wang
